name: Clone-Ridden Fields
description:
Harvest the Elysian Fields as you grow your clone army of skeletons.

Left click on the ground to navigate.

When over a wheat tile, you can summon a clone of yourself, but be careful, the wheat is sacrificed!

Once summoned, your clone skeleton helpers will harvest the field. It is then up to you to pick up to wheat to count towards your score and finish the level.

Submitted for Wizard Jam 4 game jam.

Music by: Joel Whitaker Joel's Soundcloud
